member.name: T:Rock.StatementGenerator.Rest.FinancialGivingStatementController
member.summary: NOTE: WebApi doesn't support Controllers with the Same Name, even if they have different NameSpaces, so can't call this FinancialTransactionsController

member.name: M:Rock.StatementGenerator.Rest.FinancialGivingStatementController.GetFinancialStatementGeneratorRecipients(Rock.Financial.FinancialStatementGeneratorOptions)
member.summary: Gets the statement generator recipients. This will be sorted based on the StatementGeneratorOptions

member.name: M:Rock.StatementGenerator.Rest.FinancialGivingStatementController.GetStatementGeneratorRecipientResult(Rock.Financial.FinancialStatementGeneratorRecipientRequest)
member.summary: Gets the statement generator recipient result for a specific person and associated group (family) with the specified address (locationGuid) NOTE: If a person is in multiple families, call this for each of the families so that the statement will go to the address of each family
member.param: The financial statement generator recipient request.

member.name: M:Rock.StatementGenerator.Rest.FinancialGivingStatementController.UploadGivingStatementDocument(Rock.Financial.FinancialStatementGeneratorUploadGivingStatementData)
member.summary: Uploads the giving statement document, and returns the Id

member.name: M:Rock.StatementGenerator.Rest.FinancialGivingStatementController.RenderGivingStatement(System.Int32,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Render and return a giving statement for the specified person.
member.param: The person that made the contributions. That person's entire giving group is included, which is typically the family.
The contribution calendar year. ie 2019. If not specified, the current year is assumed.

[Obsolete] The defined value ID that represents the statement lava. This defined value should be a part of the Statement Generator Lava Template defined type. If no ID is specified, then the default defined value for the Statement Generator Lava Template defined type is assumed.
if set to true transactions that have any refunds will be hidden.

member.summary: Gets or sets the person identifier for people that give as Individuals. If this is null, get the Transactions based on the GivingGroupId

member.summary: Gets or sets the location identifier. This is the Mailing Address that the statement should be sent to

member.name: P:Rock.StatementGenerator.StatementGeneratorOptions.HideCorrectedTransactions
member.summary: Hide transactions that are corrected on the same date. Transactions that have a matching negative dollar amount on the same date and same account will not be shown.
member.value: true if [hide corrected transactions]; otherwise, false.
